Package atg.droplet.xml

Class Summary
NodeForEach Select a set of DOM nodes using a pattern and iterate over them.
NodeForEachBeanInfo BeanInfo for the NodeForEach droplet.
NodeMatch Select the next DOM node that matches a pattern.
NodeMatchBeanInfo BeanInfo for the NodeMatch droplet.
XMLToDOM This droplet parses an XML document which is specified by the input parameter.
XMLToDOMBeanInfo BeanInfo for the XMLToDOM droplet.
XMLTransform Transform XML documents using a template.
XMLTransformBeanInfo BeanInfo for the XMLTransform droplet.
